get.summary: Get Apartment Plan File by ID
get.description:
Retrieve a single apartment plan file by its UUID.

:param plan_id: UUID of the plan file to retrieve
:param db: Database transaction dependency
:raises PlanFileNotFoundHTTPException: If plan file does not exist
:return: PlanFileReadSchema object representing the plan file

patch.description:
Update an existing apartment plan file.

:param plan_id: UUID of the plan file to update
:param db: Database transaction dependency
:param file: Optional UploadFile to replace the existing file
:raises PlanFileNotFoundHTTPException: If the plan file does not exist
:return: PlanFileReadSchema object representing the updated plan file

delete.description:
Delete an apartment plan file by its UUID.

:param plan_id: UUID of the plan file to delete
:param db: Database transaction dependency
:raises PlanFileNotFoundHTTPException: If the plan file does not exist
:return: Dictionary containing the deletion status and the deleted plan file ID

schema.title: Response Delete Plan File Plan Files  Plan Id  Delete

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of apartment plan files, optionally filtered by apartment or section.

:param db: Database transaction dependency
:param pagination: Pagination parameters
:param apartment_id: Optional UUID to filter by apartment
:param section_id: Optional UUID to filter by section
:param floor_id: Optional UUID to filter by floor
:return: Paginated response containing PlanFileReadSchema objects

post.description:
Create a new apartment plan file.

:param db: Database transaction dependency
:param apartment_id: Optional UUID of the apartment
:param section_id: Optional UUID of the section
:param floor_id: Optional UUID of the floor
:param file: UploadFile object representing the plan file
:raises PlanFileAlreadyExistsHTTPException: If the file already exists
:return: PlanFileReadSchema object representing the created plan file

ApartmentBulkRestoreResponseSchema.title: ApartmentBulkRestoreResponseSchema
ApartmentBulkRestoreResponseSchema.description:
Schema for bulk restore operation response.

:param status: Status message of the operation.
:param restored: Number of restored apartments.

floor_id.title: Floor Id
floor_id.description: UUID of the floor complex this building belongs to

type.description: Type of the apartment (choices: studio, one_room, two_room, three_room, four_room, duplex)

addition.description: Addition of the apartment (choices: yard, balcony, no_balcony)

status.description: Status of the apartment (choices: free, reserved, sold, deleted)

ApartmentCreateSchema.title: ApartmentCreateSchema
ApartmentCreateSchema.description:
Schema for creating a new Apartment.
Inherits all fields from BaseApartmentSchema.

floor_id.title: Floor Id
floor_id.description: UUID of the floor complex this building belongs to

type.description: Type of the apartment (choices: studio, one_room, two_room, three_room, four_room, duplex)

addition.description: Addition of the apartment (choices: yard, balcony, no_balcony)

status.description: Status of the apartment (choices: free, reserved, sold, deleted)

ApartmentReadSchema.title: ApartmentReadSchema
ApartmentReadSchema.description:
Schema for returning Apartment data.

Combines:
  - UUIDSchema: includes `id`.
  - TimestampSchema: includes `created_at` and `updated_at`.
  - BaseApartmentSchema: main fields of the apartment.

floor_id.title: Floor Id
floor_id.description: UUID of the floor complex this building belongs to

type.description: Type of the apartment (choices: studio, one_room, two_room, three_room, four_room, duplex)

addition.description: Addition of the apartment (choices: yard, balcony, no_balcony)

status.description: Status of the apartment (choices: free, reserved, sold, deleted)

ApartmentReadWithRelationsSchema.title: ApartmentReadWithRelationsSchema
ApartmentReadWithRelationsSchema.description:
Extended schema for returning Apartment data with relations.

:param plan_files: List of related PlanFile objects (as dicts).

type.description: Type of the apartment (choices: studio, one_room, two_room, three_room, four_room, duplex)

addition.description: Addition of the apartment (choices: yard, balcony, no_balcony)

status.description: Status of the apartment (choices: free, reserved, sold, deleted)

ApartmentUpdateSchema.title: ApartmentUpdateSchema
ApartmentUpdateSchema.description:
Schema for updating an existing Apartment.
All fields are optional to allow partial updates.

:param number: (Optional) Apartment number.
:param type: (Optional) Type of the apartment.
:param status: (Optional) Status of the apartment.
:param rooms_quantity: (Optional) Number of rooms in the apartment.
:param is_duplex: (Optional) Whether the apartment is duplex.
:param is_with_courtyard: (Optional) Whether the apartment has a courtyard.
:param documented_area: (Optional) Documented area in sqm.
:param actual_area: (Optional) Actual measured area in sqm.

BaseHTTPExceptionSchema.title: BaseHTTPExceptionSchema
BaseHTTPExceptionSchema.description:
Standard schema for API error responses.

:param message Human-readable error message describing the issue.

BuildingBulkRestoreResponseSchema.title: BuildingBulkRestoreResponseSchema
BuildingBulkRestoreResponseSchema.description:
Schema for bulk restore operation response.

:param status: Status message of the operation.
:param restored: Number of restored buildings.

complex_id.title: Complex Id
complex_id.description: UUID of the residential complex this building belongs to

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized name of the building (JSON object)

BuildingReadSchema.title: BuildingReadSchema
BuildingReadSchema.description:
Schema for returning Building data.

Combines:
  - UUIDSchema: includes `id`.
  - TimestampSchema: includes `created_at` and `updated_at`.
  - BaseBuildingSchema: main fields of the building.

complex_id.title: Complex Id
complex_id.description: UUID of the residential complex this building belongs to

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized name of the building (JSON object)

section_count.title: Section Count
section_count.description: Number of non-deleted sections in the complex

floor_count.title: Floor Count
floor_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

apartment_count.title: Apartment Count
apartment_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

BuildingReadWithRelationsSchema.title: BuildingReadWithRelationsSchema
BuildingReadWithRelationsSchema.description:
Extended schema for returning Building data with relations.

Currently includes all fields from BuildingReadSchema.
Additional related entities can be added here.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized name of the building (JSON object)

BuildingUpdateSchema.title: BuildingUpdateSchema
BuildingUpdateSchema.description:
Schema for updating an existing Building.
All fields are optional to allow partial updates.

:param complex_id: (Optional) UUID of the residential complex.
:param name: (Optional) Localized name of the building.
:param status: (Optional) Status of the building.

ComplexBulkRestoreResponseSchema.description:
Response schema for bulk restoring Complex entities.

:param restored: Number of restored complexes.
:return: Bulk restore response schema.

name.description: Localized names of the residential complex (JSON object)

ComplexCreateSchema.title: ComplexCreateSchema
ComplexCreateSchema.description:
Schema used when creating a new Complex.

Inherits all fields from BaseComplexSchema.

:return: Complex creation schema.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the residential complex (JSON object)

address.title: Address
address.description: Localized address of the residential complex (JSON object)

ComplexReadSchema.title: ComplexReadSchema
ComplexReadSchema.description:
Schema used when returning Complex data from the API.

Combines:
  - UUIDSchema: includes `id`
  - TimestampSchema: includes `created_at`, `updated_at`
  - BaseComplexSchema: core fields

:return: Complex read schema.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the residential complex (JSON object)

address.title: Address
address.description: Localized address of the residential complex (JSON object)

building_count.title: Building Count
building_count.description: Number of non-deleted buildings in the complex

section_count.title: Section Count
section_count.description: Number of non-deleted sections in the complex

floor_count.title: Floor Count
floor_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

apartment_count.title: Apartment Count
apartment_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

ComplexReadWithCountsSchema.title: ComplexReadWithCountsSchema
ComplexReadWithCountsSchema.description:
Schema used when returning Complex data with counts of related entities.

Includes:
  - building_count
  - section_count
  - apartment_count

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the residential complex (JSON object)

address.title: Address
address.description: Localized address of the residential complex (JSON object)

building_count.title: Building Count
building_count.description: Number of non-deleted buildings in the complex

section_count.title: Section Count
section_count.description: Number of non-deleted sections in the complex

floor_count.title: Floor Count
floor_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

apartment_count.title: Apartment Count
apartment_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

ComplexReadWithRelationsSchema.title: ComplexReadWithRelationsSchema
ComplexReadWithRelationsSchema.description:
Schema used when returning Complex data with related entities.

Inherits all fields from ComplexReadSchema.

:param buildings: List of related buildings.
:return: Complex schema with related building data.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the residential complex (JSON object)

address.title: Address
address.description: Localized address of the residential complex (JSON object)

ComplexUpdateSchema.title: ComplexUpdateSchema
ComplexUpdateSchema.description:
Schema used when updating an existing Complex.

All fields are optional to allow partial updates.

:param name: Optional localized names of the complex (JSON object).
:param address: Optional localized address of the complex (JSON object).
:param parking_space_quantity: Optional number of available parking spaces.
:param status: Optional status of the residential complex.
:return: Complex update schema.

section_id.title: Section Id
section_id.description: UUID of the section this floor belongs to.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the floor (JSON object).

FloorCreateSchema.title: FloorCreateSchema
FloorCreateSchema.description:
Schema for creating a new Floor.

Inherits from :class:`BaseFloorSchema`.

:param section_id: UUID of the section the floor belongs to.
:param name: Localized names of the floor.
:return: Newly created floor data.

section_id.title: Section Id
section_id.description: UUID of the section this floor belongs to.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the floor (JSON object).

FloorReadSchema.title: FloorReadSchema
FloorReadSchema.description:
Schema for returning Floor data.

Combines UUID and timestamp fields with base floor attributes.

:param id: Unique identifier of the floor.
:param created_at: Datetime when the floor was created.
:param updated_at: Datetime when the floor was last updated.
:param section_id: UUID of the section this floor belongs to.
:param name: Localized names of the floor.
:return: Floor details.

section_id.title: Section Id
section_id.description: UUID of the section this floor belongs to.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the floor (JSON object).

apartment_count.title: Apartment Count
apartment_count.description: Number of non-deleted apartments in the complex

section_id.title: Section Id
section_id.description: UUID of the section this floor belongs to.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the floor (JSON object).

FloorReadWithRelationsSchema.title: FloorReadWithRelationsSchema
FloorReadWithRelationsSchema.description:
Extended schema for returning Floor data with related entities.

:param id: Unique identifier of the floor.
:param section_id: UUID of the section this floor belongs to.
:param name: Localized names of the floor.
:param plan_files: List of related plan files associated with the floor.
:return: Floor details including related plan files.

name.title: Name
name.description: Localized names of the floor (JSON object).

FloorUpdateSchema.title: FloorUpdateSchema
FloorUpdateSchema.description:
Schema for updating an existing Floor.

:param name: Optional localized names of the floor.
             Example: {"uz": "2-qavat", "ru": "2-й этаж", "en": "2nd Floor"}.
:return: Updated floor data.

PaginationMetaScheme.title: PaginationMetaScheme
PaginationMetaScheme.description:
Metadata about pagination for API responses.

:param total_pages: Total number of pages available.
:param current_page: Current page number returned.
:param total_items: Total number of items in the dataset.
:param has_next_page: Whether there is a next page.
:param has_previous_page: Whether there is a previous page.
:return: Pagination metadata schema.

SectionUpdateSchema.title: SectionUpdateSchema
SectionUpdateSchema.description:
Schema used when updating an existing Section.

All fields are optional to allow partial updates.

:param building_id: Optional UUID of the building.
:param name: Optional localized names of the section (JSON object).
:param number: Optional section number (>=1).
:param status: Optional status of the section.
:return: Section update schema.

src__enums__status__Status.title: Status
src__enums__status__Status.description:
Enumeration of possible statuses.

Members:
    UNDER_CONSTRUCTION: Currently under construction.
    COMPLETED: Construction or process has been completed.
    ACTIVE: Currently active and available.
    DELETED: Soft-deleted and not active.
